subject: Chris Ghost Box 1 Built by Chris Salois
author: f1cracker75
full_text:
I have a new Chris Ghost 1 RS-12-589 that I want to trade for a Radio Shack 12-469 radio.

I record with the dead for clients, and I do not have a backup 12-469 radio. I am so over-booked that I do not have the time to test Chris's GB.

If anyone has an RS-12-469 they want to trade, please e-mail me at f1cracker75@....

Mike Edwards
